title: A paterne of a passionate minde conteining a briefe description of the sundry straunge affects of the minde of man : in the ende where-of is set downe a lesson, meete to be learned of all estates in generall.
author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
notes: Abridgement of: A philosophicall discourse, entituled, The anatomie of the minde.--Cf. p. [47].
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
